SELECT re.`id` as recordId, # zmi.`machine_id`, # zmi.machine_no, # zmi.machine_num, zmi.battery, zhi.heart_rate as heart, CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, re.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) div 1440, 'D-', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, re.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) DIV 60,'H-',TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, re.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) MOD 60,'M') as useTimes FROM record_ecg re LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON re.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zs_health_info WHERE machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, create_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME()))< 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) zhi on zhi.machine_id = re.`machine_id`
and re.id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT re.`id` as recordId, # zmi.`machine_id`, # zmi.machine_no, # zmi.machine_num, zmi.battery, zmi.`box_battery`, zhi.respiratory_rate as respiratory, CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, rs.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) div 1440, 'D-', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, rs.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) DIV 60,'H-',TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, rs.start_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME())) MOD 60,'M') as useTimes FROM record_ecg re LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON re.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zs_health_info WHERE machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, create_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME()))< 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) zhi on zhi.machine_id = re.`machine_id`
and re.`id` = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT record.`id` as recordId, pai.`name` as patientName ,pai.`case_num` as patientCaseNum,hd.`name` as departmentName,CONCAT(hr.`name`,hb.`name`) as roomAndBed , record.`start_time` as startTime,record.`end_time` as endTime,record.record_status as recordStatus, mti2.name as machineName FROM record_ecg record LEFT JOIN record_base rb ON record.`base_id` = rb.`id` LEFT JOIN patient_info pai ON rb.`patient_id` = pai.`patient_id` LEFT JOIN hospital_bed hb ON rb.`bed_id` = hb.`bed_id` LEFT JOIN hospital_room hr ON hb.`room_id` = hr.`room_id` LEFT JOIN hospital_department hd ON hr.`department_id` = hd.`department_id` LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON record.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` left join machine_type_info mti on zmi.machine_type_id = mti.id left join machine_type_info mti2 on mti.parent_id = mti2.id
record.status = 0
and record.created_time >= CONCAT(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 00:00:00')
and record.created_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 24:00:00')
and hd.department_id = #{departmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and pai.name = #{patientName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by record.record_status ,record.created_time desc
